Name: Alunite KAl_3(SO_4)_2(OH)_6
Type: Mineral
Class: Sulfates
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: SO-4A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, Utah
Collected by Ward's
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: so04aa.txt
